text: The Bunker is a comic book written by Joshua Hale Fialkov with artwork by Joe Infurnari. A pilot television episode was announced to have been written for Lionsgate TV. In 2019 it was reported that a television series is in the works at NBC. ==Plot== The world population is dying, and those responsible send a bunker back in time to warn their younger selves, in order to prevent it. ==Reception== It was highly recommended by Ain't It Cool News. Newsarama gave it a 9 out of 10. Bleeding Cool called it “A beautiful comic.” Comic Vine gave it 5 stars. Kotaku called it "a great, tense read with a killer twist ending that will have you aching for more." ==References== Category:Oni Press titles
title: The Bunker (comics)
